name: LEGO® DC Super-Villains Shazam! Movie Level Pack 1 & 2
detailed_description: Download now to get access to Shazam! Movie Level Pack 1 & 2! Control your favorite characters based on the Shazam! film. Play as Billy Batson, Freddy Freeman, and Pedro Shazam to fight against the evil Dr. Sivana and his 7 Deadly Sins! Level Pack 1 & 2 includes Shazam, Freddy Shazam, The Wizard Shazam, Dr. Sivana and more.
